sentences.sContent: The conflict among the interest groups is a political puzzle unable to blench for all the societies of all ages.
sentences.sContent_eng: The conflict among the interest groups is a political puzzle unable to blench for all the societies of all ages.
sentences.sCn: 利益集团之间的冲突是古往今来所有社会都无法回避的政治难题。

trans.tranOther: to shy away, as in fear; quail
